    • getWordAtCoordinates

      public Word getWordAtCoordinates​(int line, int column)
      Return the word at the coordinates (line, column) if it exists
      Parameters:
      line - The value of the word line we are looking for
      column - The value of the word's column we are looking for
      Returns:
      The word we were looking for, null if it's not in the list
